ygData.subject: Re: Somethign I would like you all to
ygData.msgSnippet: It looked great.  My only suggestion is have people do some of the screenshots without names.  Then you have more room to add more captions and if you happen
ygData.messageBody:
It looked great. My only suggestion is have people do
some of the screenshots without names. Then you have
more room to add more captions and if you happen to
know who the people are in the shot you can write them
in using photoshop. I hate the font SoE use. And I
loved the music also great choice....Dead
bodies...Valhalla....To Day We Die!!!

Estro Runeweaver
54 Season Druid
Child of Karana
Kane Bayle (It Suxxs)
